title: If a site, reserved in Development Plan for any public purpose is vacant or partly encumbered, or it
clause_text: If a site, reserved in Development Plan for any public purpose is vacant or partly encumbered, or it happens to be the unused portion of such public purpose for which such site is reserved, and there is no other option for locating temporary transit tenements, then such site or unused portion may be utilized for building temporary transit tenements, with
